about_the_game:
[h3]The demo version can only be played for 10 days and does not allow detailed story progression.[/h3]


Time To Live is a story about living with a woman for 30 days. She harbors unexplained suicidal impulses, and you decide to save her from jumping off your home's rooftop and protect her for 30 days. Throughout this period, you strive to prevent her from dying and unravel her identity. What will her true identity reveal after 30 days?


Live with her!
  • Gain her favor, improve abilities, and help her recover her memories through interactions with items or furniture. Each routes has a unique story, and sometimes you may have special experiences.

Protect her!
  • She has suicidal impulses, and when stress levels rise, she may attempt suicide using objects around her. Clear away dangerous items in advance and create pleasant memories for her.

Think back to the time when the world was composed of 16 colors!
  • Time To Live's graphics are created using only the standard 16 colors of EGA. For those who know, feel the nostalgia, and for those who don't, experience the amazing world of 16 colors.


  • Over 20+ multiple endings
  • 640x360 resolution EGA 16-color graphics
  • Tracker-style music

name: Time To Live Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A story of living with a woman whose identity is unknown for 30 days
